title: placements are legit
body:
I won 9/10 placements and got put into the most  glorious and well earned rank of b5.

9 out of 10 of my placement matches, and i get b5.

9 wins to 1 loss and i get b5. 
 
who wouldn't salt after getting this rank. i sure am salting right now {{summoner:11}}

replies.body: It is called a MMR RESET. It happens EVERY season....

> [{quoted}](name=A Little Unlucky,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Zyjqyu0h,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-01-21T23:00:19.152+0000)
>
> It is called a MMR RESET. It happens EVERY season....

If the MMR was completely reset, Plats could go down to Bronze technically speaking.
I won 7 out of 10 games and got bronze 4, I was bronze 2 before..
i won 4 lost 6 and got silver 4, i was silver 2 last season so its pretty fair
What was your rank last season?
I was bronze 5 and won 2 out of 10 games and got bronze 5...... I fucking earned those wins riot is holding me back with this ranked system ffs
How the hell does placement matches work my friend won 8/10 matches and she is now in B5 like wut
I feel ya man. I dropped from plat 2 to plat 5. Hard times.
I won 1 game and lost 9 and went from b2 to g3. Weird.

My friend won all ten got bronze5........
Search him luckytan8000
I won 8 games and got gold 3... Last season I was gold 2.
won 6 placements and dropped 10 divisions...seems bout fair. Haven't lost a game since surprise surprise...Feel kinda bad for ruining all these silver player placements
